subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Organizers for the Vuelta a España have unveiled a route for the 80th edition of the race that was again designed to favor cycling’s strongest climbers.
snippet: Organizers for the Vuelta a España have unveiled a route for the 80th edition of the race that was again designed to favor cycling’s strongest climbers.
